entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who will be involved in a battle with Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who continues to hunt Harry and is involved in the prophecy.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who knows the difference between being dragged into a battle and walking into it with head held high.

relationships.description: Voldemort continues to hunt Harry, making it certain that one of them will end up killing the other.
Dumbledore knows the difference between being dragged into a battle and walking into it with head held high, which Harry also understands.
